name: Chateau Beauvallon Mont Tremblant

reviews.text: I am so pleased that we took a chance and decided to stay at a property near, but not in the pedestrian village. We have been visiting Mont Tremblant for a number of years and have always stayed in the village in the past.
reviews.title: Great way to start the New Year

likes.disliked: — maid service did come a bit late in the day

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First, the hotel is lovely as you pull up, and the bell staff/valet are welcoming, polite, friendly,and capable. The front desk staff is as well. The first thing I noticed upon entering our suite ( 2 bedroom/2 baths also with a pull out couch and Murphy bed-- fit 4 comfortably, and up to 6 would be fine if you get along well) was how utterly pristine it was-- understated, cozy, not too fussy, modern,and very nice. The kitchen area is well appointed and looked as though it had never been used.
reviews.title: Disaster turned Good

likes.disliked: — Closed restaurants, bar, hot tub, no shuttle

reviews.text: The bathrooms were equally immaculate-- I thought the radiant heat under the slate tile floors was a very nice touch.
reviews.title: Loved the sincere, effortless service at the Chateau

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had been concerned that the shuttle would be inconvenient, but I have to say that the shuttle service was extremely well run. I cannot overstate how wonderful the shuttle staff was. They were available at all hours; we never had to wait more than a moment or so for a pick-up, and it is within a five minute drive to the pedestrian village.
reviews.title: Chateau Beauvallon - Execellent all around

reviews.text: Breakfast for us was not included( though for some it was- you may want to ask ), but it was not terribly expensive and it was well prepared- again, clean, cozy, great staff, understated and very nice.
reviews.title: Magical Christmas

reviews.text: Imagine visiting a postcard straight from a holiday set with staff that all seem to love their jobs! We had a family ski vacation and stayed at the Chateau Beauvallon and I can't say enough good things.
reviews.title: Best Customer Service in a beautiful setting!

reviews.text: The Chateau is very picturesque and the rooms are beautifully appointed. The gas fireplace added the right touch of cosiness and the beds were super comfortable. Our room overlooked the garden and it looked like a winter wonderland with trees that were lit up and a hot tub that was warm and very inviting.
reviews.title: Great stay!
Wow!
reviews.text: We had the continental breakfast each morning and it was what I came to expect from the hotel. Coffee was strong and hot, croissants were fresh and flakey, fruit was fresh and plentiful... always a great start to the day.

We ate in the restaurant on our last evening there if I could find one flaw it was they didn't have enough wait staff to serve the packed house. The food was excellent but took a while to get served. All in all, it certainly wasn't enough of a complaint to bring the rating down at all.
reviews.title: Loved the Chateau Beauvallon Mont Tremblant

likes.liked: — Spacious, beautiful suites and GREAT service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'll definitely be back there!
reviews.title: Amazing stay

reviews.text: Went for a long weekend skiing, Thurs - Sun, and from the time we arrived to the time we left we had a fantastic time.
reviews.title: Excellent!

likes.liked: — The overall quality of the hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is excellent, room was very high quality and the bed was the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in.
reviews.title: Can't do it better

likes.liked: — The hotel staff made the difference as well as the location

reviews.text: The staff were very friendly and the atmosphere was very relaxed - we like to enjoy ourselves on our nights out and so the hotel's shuttle bus to and from the mountain was very useful...
reviews.title: Excellent room but location not in village

reviews.text: We are planning on going back this december to see what the snow is like earlier in the season.
reviews.title: relaxing and beautiful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed from Sep 21-Sep23/07 for our anniversary and we had a great time. The rooms were immaculate. The service was attentive and welcoming. The in-house restaurant was to die for; best lamb shank I have ever tasted. It is close enough to the village and other activities. We supplemented our stay with 1 hour horse back riding(we should of done the 3 hour option up through the mountains) and a day at the spa. Both of the activities were great. We enjoyed every minute of it. Be prepared for good, wholesome Quebecois hospitality.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from having spent 3 nights at Chateau Beauvallon. It could not have been more perfect! The suite was beautiful and spotless, and the bed was extremely comfortable. The staff were warm and knowledgeable, and sent us to outstanding restaurants in the Tremblant area. We would love to return for another stay!
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After searching for the perfect place to spend a week in the Laurentians, we arrived at Chateau Beauvallon and immediately proceeded to fall in love with everything about it!
reviews.title: So impressed we are coming back!!!

likes.liked: — While the people made the experience, the location (beside an exquisite lake looking at mountain vista's) and the well appointed units made the stay relaxing.
likes.disliked: — Bathrooms would benefit by having magnifying mirrors in the bathrooms.

reviews.text: The first class accommodations were gorgeous, well appointed and comfortable. The views from sunrise to sunset were spectacular. The desk staff were warm and responsive (special kudo's to Catherine). The sensational food was as gorgeous as it was delicious. Meals were served with aplomb by top notch staff who sincerely care that everything is perfect and to your taste. Friendly and efficient shuttle drivers made our stay effortless and enjoyable (thank you David, Pablo and Ian).
reviews.title: Best ever holiday

likes.liked: — The overall look of the hotel and very frendly staff
likes.disliked: — Not being a toaster in the room

reviews.text: Elegant yet casual, Chateau Beauvallon is exceptional...a place that will be indelibly marked in your memories. Our high standards were not only met, they were exceeded. We were so comfortable and so impressed that we are already planning our return to this little piece of heaven!
reviews.title: Beautiful Beauvallon

likes.disliked: — That I didn't know about the slippers before I ran to the hottub in bare feet!

reviews.title: It's okay
reviews.text: Sherry and Joel Clodman

Booked at this Hotel because it was rated so highly on Tripadvisor. Truly a nice place, very nicely appointed rooms with Kitchenette, 2 bathrooms, 2 TV's. Outdoor Jacuzzi, small pool (more for kids than adults). A large common room where you can just hang out and meet fellow travellers. Shop around for prices since they varied widely but I think we had a true bargain, spending $ 820 for 6 nights, 2 adults and 2 kids. Shuttle to the mountain, which is only 5 minutes away.
reviews.title: Truly a nice place
What a gem!
reviews.text: This place is a must stay! We had a beautiful 2 bedroom unit that was huge.. beds were comfy with big duvets, each room and the living room had a flat screen tv, there was a kitchenette with dishwasher, cooktop, fridge and all utensils...super quiet.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautifully appointed and large 2 bathrooms...Everything just top-knotch!!
reviews.title: nice hotel

reviews.text: The staff was outstanding, extremely accomodating and super-friendly. No problem with shuttles to the village at any time I requested.. The restaurant food was delicious and the hot tub superb.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel for family

likes.liked: — quiet retreat away from the main village

reviews.text: This place is a definite gem and we will most definitely be back!!
reviews.title: Wonderful

aka: Chateau Beauvallon Mont Tremblant Hotel Mont Tremblant
description: Located just five minutes -3km (2mi.) from the Tremblant ski resort, on a vast, private, lakeside property where guests can relax and enjoy indoor, outdoor pool & hot tub, cross country skiing & snow showing right from our door step. Whether a romantic retreat, ladies-only getaway or enjoyable family vacations, we take care of every little detail. We have a charming restaurant & bar with a menu of epicurean delights.
